tr.td: % fibronectin fibers within ± 20° and number of metastasis

fn.p: The shared data from XY pairs was randomly sampled from, with replacement, to create simulated data sets with preserved correlated structure. For a given n (the number of observations) 10,000 simulations were run and Spearman's rho was calculated for each simulated data set. The power was then calculated by counting the number of times p ≤ 0.05 and dividing by 10,000.
